General.Name: United Renewable Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: United Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of solar cells and related systems, solar power generation modules, and wafers in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Solar Energy, System, and Other segments. The company offers solar modules, energy storage systems, including industrial ESS container with UL9540, lithium-ion UPS, and energy management systems, as well as hydrogen fuel cell motorcycle. It also engages in the construction of solar power plants, electronic component manufacturing and selling, and solar and agriculture related businesses; and importing and exporting activities. The company was formerly known as Neo Solar Power Corp. United Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
